title: Healix
description: This project was developed during the SUI Foundation Hackathon Lausanne 2025. It is a decentralized platform for sharing emotions securely on the Sui blockchain, with on-chain encryption using SEAL and Move smart contracts.

title: My Personal Website

title: miniJ
description: Interpreter of a simplified version of J (derived from APL) implemented in Python using ANTLR and NumPy.

title: Multi Agent Reinforcement Learning
description: Explored Reinforcement Learning algorithms in a partially observable, multi-agent environment. Focused on Joint-Action Learning leveraging Game-Theoretic solution concepts to study agent coordination and strategic interactions.

title: Snap2Shop
description: This project was developed during the HackUPC Hackathon Barcelona 2025, solving the Inditex challenge. It is a mobile app built using Flutter, FastAPI and Inditex API which leverages Computer Vision solutions for visual search of fashion clothes.
